      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        This line filters the below sql string to select data from specific columns, then sends them to an instance of Appointment that appends to appointmentdata, and also used getTimestamp to pass to info back for appointment updates. Similar operations are implemented in this file to condense code

      • getCustomerAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCustomerAppointments​(int custid)
        This observablelist method is a lambda expression that filters customer ids through comparing the @custid parameter to appointment object's getCustomer_ID() method call. The results are stored in a collection of type observableArrayList.
